participant_1.name: Amina
participant_1.personality: Amina is lively and adventurous, always seeking new experiences and expressing herself through dance.
participant_1.background: i was born in somalia. now i live in the united states. i like to dance. my aunt helped me escape when i was of.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Jake is laid-back and passionate about classic cars. He enjoys the simple pleasures of life and loves spending time outdoors.
participant_2.background: i own two vintage mustangs. my favorite music is country. i like to work on vintage cars. i've two dogs. i like to go to country concerts on weekends.
